Not sure if this is documented somewhere, but just for the record, we've been converting all header guards as specified in the [style guide](https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#The__define_Guard) (`<PROJECT>_<PATH>_<FILE>_H_`), for example:

* `GAZEBO_PHYSICS_BASE_HH_`
* `GAZEBO_GUI_MODEL_LINKINSPECTOR_HH_`
* `GAZEBO_PLUGINS_EVENTS_OCCUPIEDEVENTSSOURCE_HH_`
* `GAZEBO_TEST_INTEGRATION_MARKERTEST_HH_`
